title: Looking for - Support or an ADC main. (Must use a VOIP)
body:
As the title says. 

I am looking for a ADC main that i can support for, as most ADC have no clue how to play the lane or have very minimal knowledge of the lane role. 

Looking more for a bronze maybe silver player  or someone in that rank as this account is a bronze too. 

I am also looking for a support main if i can't find a ADC main. Someone who knows how to communicate and use the ping system properly or uses TS or Discord. I want full communication with who ever i am laning with so we can set up trades properly and last hit/execute properly. 


Invite me in game and tell me you are from the forum.
